title: Questions regrading number of INTERNAL Assessments.
content:
Hey,

I have secured a seat at RR Campus(CSE) and wanted to know how many ISA exams we will have for my batch starting this month.

I have read on reddit and elsewhere about the new 5 ISA system, However During the COUNSELLING Process we were told there would be 2 ISA and 1 ESA , thus leading to the confusion.

It would be great help if anyone could clarify.

Thank YOU ;)

comments.body: In your first year, you will be following the 2 ISAs and 1 ESA system. From your second it will be the 5 ISAs and 1 ESAs schedule.

Thank you for the response ...5 isa in a Sem seems a bit much...
If you are past your first year ..how often are the exams then ?? Every other week ?

Iâ€™m going to second year now. During our first year we followed 2 ISA schedule which will be the same for you. From second year we will follow the 5 ISAs schedule which will also be the same for you. 
In the 5 ISA s system we will have an ISA once after every 2 weeks
